original_text: Thus was accomplished all the work of Solomon from the day the foundation of the house of the Lord was laid until it was finished. So the house of the Lord was completed.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전의 기초를 쌓던 날부터 준공하기까지 모든 것을 완비하였으므로 여호와의 전 공사가 결점 없이 끝나니라

sentences.original_text: Thus was accomplished all the work of Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 솔로몬의 모든 일이 이루어졌다

sentences.original_text: from the day the foundation of the house of the Lord was laid
So the house of the Lord was completed
